overview: Racing for the Gold was a series of short videos played as advertisement during the 2010 winter olympics. Each video had a narration by Gobber the Belch. All of these shorts are included on the second disc of the Deluxe Dragon Collection. A 2010 miniseries of 5 short episodes: Bobsledding, Medals, Snowboarding, Speed Skating and Ski Jumping.
title: Racing For The Gold
